member.name: T:Ploosqva.WebUtils.Controls.ValidationControl
member.summary: Control which allows thorough validation of asp.net web controls without the need of using validation controls and displays itself as a summary. It has been created to allow easy validation of Ajax controls

member.name: F:Ploosqva.WebUtils.Controls.ValidationControl.idsValidated
member.summary: List of control already validated in this request. It is needed to avoid controls not being highlighted if numerous checks are performed on that control and the last check succeeds

member.name: M:Ploosqva.WebUtils.Controls.ValidationControl.Validate(System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl,System.String,Ploosqva.WebUtils.Controls.ValidationControl.ValidationMethod)
member.summary: Runs check and shows error message if it fails

member.name: M:Ploosqva.WebUtils.Controls.ValidationControl.ShowErrorMessage(System.Web.UI.Control,System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl,System.String)
member.summary: Adds the error message to summary and highlights the control which failed it's check

member.name: M:Ploosqva.WebUtils.Controls.ValidationControl.ValidateRequired(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox,System.String)
member.summary: Check if TextBox isn't empty

member.name: M:Ploosqva.WebUtils.Controls.ValidationControl.ValidateRequired(System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList,System.String)
member.summary: Check if DropDownList has an option selected. This assumes that if the first item is selected, nput is not valid

member.name: M:Ploosqva.WebUtils.Controls.ValidationControl.ValidateRequired(System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl,System.String)
member.summary: Check if a ListControl (eg. CheckBoxList or RadioButtonList) has at least one option selected

member.name: M:Ploosqva.WebUtils.Controls.ValidationControl.ValidateRequired(System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox,System.String)
member.summary: Check if CheckBox is checked

member.name: M:Ploosqva.WebUtils.Controls.ValidationControl.ValidateCompare(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox,System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox,System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator,System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType,System.String)
member.summary: Checks a TextBox's intput data type ora the ralation between values from two textboxes. If it fails, will be highlighted
member.param: Second TextBox. If performing data type check, this can be null

member.name: M:Ploosqva.WebUtils.Controls.ValidationControl.ValidateRegularExpression(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Check wheatrher TextBox's input matches a regular expression supplied

member.name: M:Ploosqva.WebUtils.Controls.ValidationControl.CustomValidate(System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl,System.String,Ploosqva.WebUtils.Controls.ValidationControl.ValidationMethod)
member.summary: Allows to run a custom test

member.name: P:Ploosqva.WebUtils.Controls.ValidationControl.IsValid
member.summary: Indicates wheather all controls have passed validation. This can be used instead of Page#IsValid to control flow

member.name: P:Ploosqva.WebUtils.Controls.ValidationControl.HeaderText
member.summary: Validation summary header, displayed above errors list

member.name: T:Ploosqva.WebUtils.Controls.ValidationControl.ValidationMethod
member.summary: Validity check method

member.summary: Sample regular expressions for use with regular expression validation method

member.summary: Standard email address
